cells.data: -- intersect :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> [a]on intersect(xs, ys)	if length of xs < length of ys then		set {shorter, longer} to {xs, ys}	else		set {longer, shorter} to {xs, ys}	end if	if shorter â‰  {} then		set lst to {}		repeat with x in shorter			if longer contains x then set end of lst to contents of x		end repeat		lst	else		{}	end ifend intersect
